description:
Next time you're hiking, backpacking or mountaineering, use these water-resistant gaiters and comfortably stride through bushes, mud or sand. Hook-and-loop closure still does up when covered in mud (unlike a zipper).

  • Made of abrasion-resistant 420-denier nylon with a water-resistant polyurethane coating
  • Double-layer bottom panel for durability
  • Overlapping hook-and-loop front closure for easy on/off
  • Reinforced bootlace hook
  • Contoured profile provides snug fit
  • Toggle cord top closure is adjustable to provide a tight seal
  • Adjustable underarch strap is made of strong, moulded polyurethane
  • Sized to be worn with hiking boots
  • Small fits men's boot sizes 5 to 8, women's sizes 7 to 9. Medium fits men's 8 to 11, women's 9.5 to 10.5. Large fits men's 11 to 13
  • Small fits calves up to 46cm circumference. Medium fits calves up to 49cm. Large fits calves up to 52cm
name: MEC Nylon Gaiters - Unisex
